```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readr)
```



```{r}
fish_info <- read_csv(here("fish_data_app/data", "fish_info.csv"))

fish_info1 <-select(fish_info, -c(iucn_sid, src, map_f))
```

```{r}
top_stressors <- fish_info1 %>% 
  filter(vuln > 0.5) %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  summarize(stressor)
 
top_stressors

```
